directions: Heat olive oil and butter in a skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir potato strips in the hot oil-butter until browned on all sides, 20 to 25 minutes. Transfer fries to a paper towel-lined plate; season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 3 large potatoes, sliced lengthwise into 1/2-inch circles and cut into 1/2-inch strips
title: Salt and Pepper Skillet Fries
